name: The Crows
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You call forth an unceasing murder of spirit crows, flying forth from you in a 90 foot long, 25 foot wide, 10 foot tall line. The crows obstruct vision into and out of the area, making it impossible to see further than 5 feet. Creatures that move through the area use 2 feet of movement for every 1 foot traveled.

Creatures who start their turns in the area or who move into the area during their turn must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d6 slashing damage on a failure and half damage on a success.

You can't move or take any other action while concentrating on the spell.
